name: Meow Meow
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
I don't really know how to say all this properly but... i love you like a lot.
 Being with you just feels right. I love your smile, your eyes,your laugh.. even the way you look at random things.
you make everything better just by being there.
you’re really special to me, more than you probably know. Happy Birthday again.
i hope you feel loved.
May aloo aloo always irritates you! ;)
wishhappy:
I don't really know how to say all this properly but... i love you like a lot.
 Being with you just feels right. I love your smile, your eyes,your laugh.. even the way you look at random things.
you make everything better just by being there.
you’re really special to me, more than you probably know. Happy Birthday again.
i hope you feel loved.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
